Bungie | Bellevue, WA | Gameplay Engineer

As a Gameplay Engineer at Bungie, you will play an integral role in bridging the last mile technology between game design, art and our engine. Your work will play a key role as we break new ground in seamless, persistent, networked game simulation. Most importantly, you will work with a fun, dedicated, driven and energetic team devoted to creating the best and most technically impressive games in the world.

If interested, please shoot me an email at bbaek@bungie.com
